reviews.review: This is excellent. Had a great time with this game, I am now keen to complete the advanced level and move onto the second one.

很有趣的游戏，很多时候会让你觉得哇，原来可以这样。
不过流程有点短，我这么蠢笨的人死了几百次也只用了5个小时就通关了。
Glados萌萌哒，最后的歌曲也很好听。
唯一的问题是这个游戏3D眩晕症的人玩起来很痛苦 _(°:з」∠)_

I absolutely love the Portal series, completing both games on XBox 360. The game is absolutely wonderfull and full of intriguing puzzles and gameplay. The story is amazing, and this game scores an 8.5/10.

Gran juego, una muy buena historia, glados una de las mejores villanas de todos los videojuegos, una muy buena jugabilidad y una gran idea muy bien llevada.

Sin duda el mejor juego de estrategias y logica de la historia, ademas esta bastante bien hecho graficamente.
I kinda wanna play more of this game but my playtime's at 69 minutes.
its a good game makes you think and plan ahead
13 hours to get every achievement. Would do it again. So why haven't you?

This game is a true masterpiece. 

Every aspect in this game compliments eachother to create a wonderful experience.

The gameplay unique and innovate. Every puzzle is fun and range anywhere from easy to mind bendingly hard. The pacing is great, as you go on the game teaches you about its machanics step by step never throwing you in a confusing situation and ensuring you know how to use them. No lengthy decription, no button layouts, just short expoision from Glados and the games natural learning curve. The difficulty of his game is also well paced.

The story is very simple, but the game makes up for that with everything else. From the start of the game, the clean, bright, Apple inpired, art style perfectly complimates the the sence of humor. You're main guide Glados is tuants and teaches you throughout the game, she talks completely innocently and caually, but she (and Apature science as a whole) is completely sociopathic. This dark sense of humor is extremely well done. The pacing is also brilliant, as you move on through the test chambers the true nature of Apature sciecnes is slowely revealed to you, cryptic messages left behind can be found, and Glados' comments become darker and darker. The main character Chell has literally no character development or dialog, but that is arguably good becuase it makes it feel like Glados is talking directly to you, not just a character you are controing. 

Everthing in this game is memorable, the brilliant game machanics, the turrets, the graphics, and of course, Glados herself. I would recomend Portal to absolutely everyone as it is a truely unique experience and perhpas one of the greatest video games ever created.
uma das melhores campanhas que existe

This game is designed with a really nice approach. A one-of-a-kind!
However, the story is a bit of short, but still enjoyable.

ProTip:

DO NOT PLAY 2 BEFORE 1!!!

Trust me, or else you'll regret it

Very innovative gameplay on its time

Incredible story, great gameplay, fun gun and a female robot with sarcastic jokes, there are not many better games out there. If you still haven't played it, you should.

Also be patient  with challenge maps and achievements, they can make you suicidal.
10/10 erlogenen Kuchen
Probably the only perfect game I've ever played. 10/10

Alapjáték. Mit "játék", inkább "mű"!
Semmi negatívat nem tudok róla mondani. Remek megjelenés, lebilincselő narráció, egyszerű irányítás, nagyszerű játékmenet. Akinek rövid a "főszál" (3 óra sincsen), rengeteg kihívást tartogat még utána is!
A második rész előtt érdemes kijátszani, nem bánod meg!

Awesome game.  Finished it in about 5 hours and I thought the puzzle difficulty was exactly perfect.  There progression of difficulty was also perfect.  There were a couple of times when I yelled "YES" when I figured out a cool solution to a puzzle.  Highly recommended.
Unique and interesting level design makes it fantastic as well as brilliant voice acing and plot twists which make it all worthwhile!

I literaly got this game yesterday, and i must say that the game is short (Well the main story at least). I have never played Portal before, ever (I live a sad life), but by far the game is amazing. GLaDOS keeps telling you about a cake, and through out the game you really think to yourself, is the cake a lie? Every level is unique and different from the last one, the game makes you think real hard and questions every strategy you have. The name "Portal" tells you everything you need to know about the game, get the Portal gun, shoot Portals, solve puzzles, and have fun. You can choose to be a test subject, or break the rules and do what you wanna do. 9.15/10 Would buy a real Portal gun.
Es el mejor juego de rompecabezas del 2011, 100% recomendado para aquellos que desafian su mente y la gravedad.

Since Portal 2, it's easy to forget just how brilliant this little game is. It still stands on its own feet, even after all this time.

"If you being to feel light-headed, feel free to pass out."

Got this game on sale of 2.50. Runs like a champ on maximum graphics. The game play is amazing featuring incredible puzzles. And the hole time an annoying AI watches your every move and pretends to be helpful. Fun game 10/10

This game is a must for anyone who hasn't played it. Its fun, challenging and weirdly Charming. I did a full review of this game which you can read here: http://crashdoesreviews.blogspot.com/2015/01/portal-pc-review.html

This is a very interesting game we got here.
You have a FPS (First Person Shooter)where the only gun you shoot shoots out portals. 
I sometimes call them doors, don't ask why.
But overall I am very impressed with this game, it looks and feels a lot like Half-Life 2.
My only real complaint is that the game is very short.

But perhaps my biggest issue is that I still didn't get that cake I was promised. XD
This is a game that should not be ignored.

While this is a two hour game, I would recomend it to anyone. Portal does not bore its audiance with all of the fluff. It executes the setting perfectly and only slowly exposes what has ocured other than tesing at aperture.

GR8 B8 M8 I R8 8/8.
leuk spel
nice game !!
No matter how many times I play through this game, it always gives me goose bumps! ;)
Доволі добре, як для модифікаціїї для вічного Half-Life... Але для повноцінної гри - 4 години геймплею (головного сюжету) замало. В цілому купувати, я б не рекомендував....
Anyway This Cake Is Great

Simply unique, this game tests your creativity in a world where physics and matter could be manipulated through the use of portals. Hopefully, the science and technology for this is discovered and made available to us within our lifetime. I would really love to scratch my back without being in awkward positions.

Other than the short gameplay, the puzzles can be mind-boggling at times. Nothing a little trial & error couldn't fix. And it has a nice song at the ending. 8/10, would fall 30,000 feet again.

ps. The cake is not a lie darn it!

晕3d者请务必谨慎玩此游戏

开创性的玩法，有趣的谜题，唯一的缺点就是故事太短，这点貌似二代有所改进
故事由各种对话组成，玩家渐渐脑补出这是一个什么样的世界

结尾官方满满的恶意。。。G胖真的不会数3么。。。
Dobrá hra, jen mám strach, že v pozdějších misích na to už nebudu mít IQ.
a very good game

Niesamowita gierka :D co prawda trochę krótka bo ok2.5 godzinki ale i tak warta tych 2 euro po przecenie

詰まれば、一旦ゲーム終了して、一息。
また再開すれば、新しい考え方が見つかるかも。おもしろい。
I think I can safely say that this is the best game I've played in a looong time. Buy it, its short but TOTALLY worth every penny.

Just finished it again. I cried all the way through "Still Alive".
This game easily transcends into art. It's just so good.
非常有意思的游戏，但是有点伤脑子，为了游戏性最好别看攻略，我一口气打到19关...用了3小时...

No cóż mogę powiedzieć ... Gra jest naprawdę fajna ,ale i tak się zawiodłem (zbyt duże oczekwiania miałęm) . Wiele poziomów jest dziecinnie prostę , tylko nie które dają na dużo do myślenia (przynajmniej w moim przypadku). Jednak stawianie portalu i przechodzenie przez niego sprawia mi taką frajdę ,że daje mu ocenę 7/10 . Pozdrawiam Matteo
PS: Portal 2 raczej będzie o wiele lepszy przez system Multi :)

Das Spiel hängt sich unter Linux die ganze Zeit auf. 



Meine Hardware: 


Intel i5-4200U

AMD Radeon HD 8750M



Wirklich schade, zumal das Spiel auch wirklich Spaß machen kann.

Portal  is about shooting portals to overcome complex puzles, while a strange and funny story goes on.
If you have never played this game or the second, buy the bundle. These 2 games are probably the best game that exists.
It was released in 2008. Let that sink in while you play it...
Es un juegaso, me encantó háganse el favor y comprenlo es muy bueno y tiene la dificultad justa y necesaria.

재밌는 게임

I wish I had a portal gun (and those no-fall-damage boots too)

playing this game is bad for my eyes

Compre los dos en oferta, pensando "ha bueno, otro juego más"...POR DIOS QUE ESTABA EQUIVOCADO! Realmente me hizo pensar, sufrir, sentir y gozar cada vez que ganaba. Y ese final, that music. Corto pero preciso.
The portal games are some of my favourite puzzle games. It is a very short, yet sweet experience. Like cake.
oyun çok güzel beyni biraz yoruyor fakat sürükleyici bi oyun ŞİDDETLE TAVSİYE EDERİM :)

Portal es el tipo de juego que todos los desarralladores 'indie' aspiran a crear pero pocos lo logran. 

Tiene una mecánica de juego bastante simple que se domina a los pocos minutos de haber empezado. Se desarrolla con pocos elementos, casi de manera minimalista, demostrando así que para cerar un producto con alma no se necesita de grandes explosiones y muchos adornos.

Dura de 4 a 6 horas, pero durante su brevedad mantiene el balance perfecto entre gameplay y narrativa. Hay estudios que en 20 horas de juego no logran contar una historia de manera tan atinada como lo hace Portal.


Para concluir, es una pequeña maravilla creada por Valve.
This is one of the best games I've played in my life, the physics (especially at the time) we creative and cool, and GLaDOS was a great antagonist.

Its Okay but if you were to choose between portal and Portal 2. There is no competition. Go for Portal 2! Still if you would like to know the whole story starting with Portal then Portal 2 then go for it!

Really good game, Beat it in about 3 hours, kinda challenging, cant wait to play the sequel which i also bought. i reccomend it. now i want to buy a real portal gun, but i know i cant :(
also, its kinda creepy, its about as close as i get to survival horror games, i cant really stand them, and this is just on the edge for me

Portal is a decent puzzle game and looks extremly good, but however short. The games opens of you as a charcter named "chell" and hears a computerized voice named GLaDOS (Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System) and must go through 19 test chambers with a device called a portal gun.

I think valve knew what they were doing with this one, im giving it a 64, Thats not bad valve!!

Good Job!
İlk bölümler oldukça kolay olsa da bir süre sonra işler zorlaşıyor ve daha çok başınız ağrıyor. Mükemmel bir oyun. Bulmaca tarzı oyunlar için önerebileceğim sayılı oyunlardan birisidir.

Me parece una obra arté. No se como he podido tardar tanto tiempo en tener este juegazo, y eso que es Portal, que Portal 2 aun tiene segun la comunidad, mas nota.

gra jest wspaniała! Zagadki mają dobry poziom trudności a, scenariusz to majstersztyk. I jeszcze GlaDos :D Świetna!

i pppaaamiiieętaj...































































































Cake is a lie.

Vale cada centavo, aunque sea corto, la historia que lleva trasfondo es bastante extensa, y no hay mejor lugar para iniciar en la saga que el primer juego (Daaah). Adquieres este juego, si no te gusta, no compras el 2 (que es un poco mas caro y mas largo (pero mejor hecho xD)); y si si te gusta... felicidades hermano, eres parte de nosotros.

El juego es muy entretenido y adictivo, ya había escuchado sobre este juego pero nunca le di la oportunidad,si eres de los que no te gustan los juegos de puzzles, dale  la oportunidad a portal cambiara tu idea de ese genero
amusant
Juegazo, y en oferta no llega a 2€, no es muy complicado como lo pinta mucha gente y la verdad vicia mucho jeje, para pasar una buena tarde, lo unico malo es que es un poco corto.

Replaying Portal, it was fun yes, but more funny this time around. Only a good couple hours of gameplay but worth the money.
Great game, the boss fight in a puzzle game was awesome and humor was omnipresent :)

So fun!! The last two levels are pretty hard but the first ones are quite easy, still, i think anyone will enjoy this game a lot, its challenging and simple, really funny aswell. Warning: you may get frustrated in some levels, try to solve everything on your own!
Dizziness, nausea,  but funny
the best valve game

Portal - это довольно интересная головоломка, пройдена за 2.4 часа основная компания, но как я понял упор идет на пользовательские карты, что очень даже хорошо, потому что есть новые и сложно - интересные карты.
А так же в игре присутствует очень много смешных и интересных диалогов, в общем поиграть стоит.
8 из 10
Best puzzle game i've ever played! I recommend it to anyone who likes puzzle games that require some thought.
For a older game it is still fun to play.
Good fun game. Challenging puzzles, shame its only got a 2 hour campaign but still great. [SPOILER] awesome song at the end

What a gem. I didn't think I would like this game, but I do. It was a neat experience that every gamer should partake. 

This game never interested me before since it was a puzzle game and I thought it would be boring. Boy was I was wrong. Valve did an excellent job. I'm off to Portal 2. 

Buy it. Play it. You'll enjoy the hell out of it. It only takes around 4 hours anyway to complete. You'll have fun. I guarantee it.
Esta muy bueno el juego, ademas que el final me gusto mucho, me dejo conmovido. uwu Ademas te hace pensar mucho sobre como poner los portales y otras cosas mas. 9/10

I had got Portal 2 on PS3 some time ago and beat it. Now after playing Portal I wish I would've played this game first. It is true that Portal is a short game, but it is worth it only if you buy both Portal and Portal 2. Portal is like the set-up for Portal 2. Portal has a feeling of lost hope and it complements Portal 2. I would recommend this game only if you get Portal 2 as well and play them side by side. These games together are worth full price, but Portal itself is not.

The worst part of this game is when it ended and I no longer had a purpose in life.

10/10

前年玩完了Portal2后 开始Portal 但是不知道什么原因半途而废了 

直到今天 花了一个小时把之前的存档通关

总体来说  这真的是一款极佳的游戏系列

或许Portal的流程很短 玩起来也不像Portal2需要动点脑子 画面也有点out fashion

也少了很多在Portal2中因为对话而引发的思考

但是最后结局时 那块蛋糕 那首Still Alive 

才是这个游戏的真正点睛之笔 让人回味无穷

The cake is a lie!!!

For the people, Who are still Alive!!!

--------------------------------

THANK YOU FOR PARTCIPANTING IN THIS ENRICHMENT CENTER ACTIVITY!!
Valve's trademark creativity is on full display in Portal.

What a fantastic game. I originally got this as part of The Orange Box, before Team Fortress 2 was free, and it was so worth it. Even now for 10$ (when it's not on sale) it's such a steal. It's an incredibly fun (albeit short) game, that I wish I could experience again for the first time. Things improve exponentially in the sequel, but for what it was at the time (and again, even now) Portal is still an amazing game. Really funny, neat puzzles and mechanics, and a interesting story. I do wish it was a little bit longer, had more variety in the puzzles and expanded on the story and world. And some of those final achievements were real tedious to get (such as Least Steps) but you can easily look past all that because the the short campaign is so memorable.

I'd give it a 9.0/10.
i love it is a hard but it is fun
